sqlMap.select: select a.CW_DJXH as cwDjxh,a.SS_JGBM as ssJgbm,a.ZR_KC_XJ as zrKcXj,a.ZR_KC_YH as zrKcYh,a.ZR_KC_YK as zrKcYk, a.KC_XJ as kcXj,a.KC_YH as kcYh,a.KC_YK as kcYk,a.SR_XJ as srXj,a.SR_YH as srYh, a.SR_YK as srYk,a.ZC_XJ as zcXj,a.ZC_YH as zcYh,a.ZC_YK as zcYk,a.KC_XJ_SRZ as kcXjSrz, a.KC_YH_SRZ as kcYhSrz,a.SR_XJ_SRZ as srXjSrz,a.SR_YH_SRZ as srYhSrz,a.ZC_XJ_SRZ as zcXjSrz,a.ZC_YH_SRZ as zcYhSrz, a.RQ as rq,a.XF_SR_XJ as xfSrXj,a.DF_SR_XJ as dfSrXj,a.YJ_SR_XJ as yjSrXj,a.DSHK_SR_XJ as dshkSrXj, a.YS_SR_XJ as ysSrXj,a.QT_SR_XJ as qtSrXj,a.XF_SR_YH as xfSrYh,a.DF_SR_YH as dfSrYh,a.YJ_SR_YH as yjSrYh, a.DSHK_SR_YH as dshkSrYh,a.YS_SR_YH as ysSrYh,a.QT_SR_YH as qtSrYh,a.CJR_CZY_DJXH as cjrCzyDjxh,a.CJRQ as cjrq, a.XGR_CZY_DJXH as xgrCzyDjxh,a.XGRQ as xgrq from CW_ZJRB a where a.CW_DJXH=#cwDjxh#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_CW_DJXH.nextval as cwDjxh from dual
insert into CW_ZJRB(CW_DJXH,SS_JGBM,ZR_KC_XJ,ZR_KC_YH,ZR_KC_YK, KC_XJ,KC_YH,KC_YK,SR_XJ,SR_YH, SR_YK,ZC_XJ,ZC_YH,ZC_YK,KC_XJ_SRZ, KC_YH_SRZ,SR_XJ_SRZ,SR_YH_SRZ,ZC_XJ_SRZ,ZC_YH_SRZ, RQ,XF_SR_XJ,DF_SR_XJ,YJ_SR_XJ,DSHK_SR_XJ, YS_SR_XJ,QT_SR_XJ,XF_SR_YH,DF_SR_YH,YJ_SR_YH, DSHK_SR_YH,YS_SR_YH,QT_SR_YH,CJR_CZY_DJXH,CJRQ, XGR_CZY_DJXH,XGRQ) values(#cwDjxh:NUMERIC#,#ssJgbm:NUMERIC#,#zrKcXj:NUMERIC#,#zrKcYh:NUMERIC#,#zrKcYk:NUMERIC#, #kcXj:NUMERIC#,#kcYh:NUMERIC#,#kcYk:NUMERIC#,#srXj:NUMERIC#,#srYh:NUMERIC#, #srYk:NUMERIC#,#zcXj:NUMERIC#,#zcYh:NUMERIC#,#zcYk:NUMERIC#,#kcXjSrz:NUMERIC#, #kcYhSrz:NUMERIC#,#srXjSrz:NUMERIC#,#srYhSrz:NUMERIC#,#zcXjSrz:NUMERIC#,#zcYhSrz:NUMERIC#, to_date(#rq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'),#xfSrXj:NUMERIC#,#dfSrXj:NUMERIC#,#yjSrXj:NUMERIC#,#dshkSrXj:NUMERIC#, #ysSrXj:NUMERIC#,#qtSrXj:NUMERIC#,#xfSrYh:NUMERIC#,#dfSrYh:NUMERIC#,#yjSrYh:NUMERIC#, #dshkSrYh:NUMERIC#,#ysSrYh:NUMERIC#,#qtSrYh:NUMERIC#,#cjrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#,to_date(#cjrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'), #xgrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#,to_date(#xgrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
sqlMap.update: update CW_ZJRB set CW_DJXH=#cwDjxh#,SS_JGBM=#ssJgbm#,ZR_KC_XJ=#zrKcXj#,ZR_KC_YH=#zrKcYh#,ZR_KC_YK=#zrKcYk#, KC_XJ=#kcXj#,KC_YH=#kcYh#,KC_YK=#kcYk#,SR_XJ=#srXj#,SR_YH=#srYh#, SR_YK=#srYk#,ZC_XJ=#zcXj#,ZC_YH=#zcYh#,ZC_YK=#zcYk#,KC_XJ_SRZ=#kcXjSrz#, KC_YH_SRZ=#kcYhSrz#,SR_XJ_SRZ=#srXjSrz#,SR_YH_SRZ=#srYhSrz#,ZC_XJ_SRZ=#zcXjSrz#,ZC_YH_SRZ=#zcYhSrz#, RQ=to_date(#rq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),XF_SR_XJ=#xfSrXj#,DF_SR_XJ=#dfSrXj#,YJ_SR_XJ=#yjSrXj#,DSHK_SR_XJ=#dshkSrXj#, YS_SR_XJ=#ysSrXj#,QT_SR_XJ=#qtSrXj#,XF_SR_YH=#xfSrYh#,DF_SR_YH=#dfSrYh#,YJ_SR_YH=#yjSrYh#, DSHK_SR_YH=#dshkSrYh#,YS_SR_YH=#ysSrYh#,QT_SR_YH=#qtSrYh#,CJR_CZY_DJXH=#cjrCzyDjxh#,CJRQ=to_date(#cjrq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), XGR_CZY_DJXH=#xgrCzyDjxh#,XGRQ=to_date(#xgrq#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where CW_DJXH=#cwDjxh#
